website_summaries.verdict: An excellent kitchen multi-tasker, especially as a scoop for food transfers. Remarkably sturdy for the price.
pros: All stainless steel construction easier to clean
Very efficient as a food chopper
Handle also works as an apple corer
cons: Metal handle can become slippery when wet
Ruler gradations may not be accurate
Not a high grade stainless steel

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this product. Compared to the one I was trying to replace, it is very thin, with a concave underside. The small thickness means that it more fragile and less effective in keeping bread warm. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but not great...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of this stone warmer, but it didn't perform as well as I'd hoped. It was fairly inexpensive at about $6. It is really easy to use and keeps bread/rolls warmer for longer, but only for about 15-20 minutes longer than if I'd used no warming stone at all. I even wrap the rolls in several cloth napkins with the stone in attempts to seal in as much heat as possible. I will continue to use it because it's definitely better than using nothing at all. I just wish it emitted enough heat to keep items warm throughout the meal.
customer_reviews.author: karenmh33

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for my bread warmers
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for my bread warmers. However, I am very sad about one of the 8 I received One was all rounded up like a biscuit and does not lay flat. All the others are great. Any way I can return one????? Or replace this mis formed one?????
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep your dinner rolls/bread warm throughout your meal.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my serving dish perfectly and really does help keep the rolls warm. Very pleased with my purchase. Just be sure to measure the serving dish you plan to use to make sure it's the right size. Very pleased with this purchase. I have a lot of dinners and this is an easy way to make sure you have warm bread/rolls throughout the mea..
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen must-have
customer_reviews.text: I like that this implement is all one piece of steel...no chance of rust build up in those hard to reach places ! It is very sturdy and the cutting edge is super sharp. I bought it for cutting homemade soap, but one can use it for cutting veggies instead. With how sharp it is, you can use it for cutting meat, too ! The steel is thick, which I love. Good product !
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I may honestly have missed something in the description. I certainly thought it was larger. A disappointment as far a functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Laurice Dunning

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: They don't hold heat at all; don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Floski

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how good this tool would be for chopping, but it's great for scraping chopped vegetables off the cutting board. It's sturdy and well constructed. The edges and corners have been ground down so they are not sharp enough to cut the user, but good enough for what the tool is designed to do. The handle is strong and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: beachhawk

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm! Hot Rolls!
customer_reviews.text: This warmer just fits my breadbasket, and keeps the rolls warm during dinner.
customer_reviews.author: BetBen

customer_reviews.title: Continues to cook rolls
customer_reviews.text: Worked to keep homemade rolls warm however it overcooked/ overbrowned the bottom of the rolls that were set directly on top of it. Might work better if you have a separate pocket for it in the bag or basket the rolls go in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Handy for keeping food warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little device to help keep your bread or biscuits warm, or transporting dishes you want to keep warm while traveling short distances
customer_reviews.author: Cathee

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize just how much easier it would be to transport chopped produce now. I'm in love with this
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: works great. Had been looking for bun warmer and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Used during Thanksgiving to keep rolls warm, works great. Had been looking for bun warmer and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Motorcycle chick

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and brittle
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect until it breaks. Yes, it is very easy to break even with a short height fall or a fall on a soft surface. It is quite heavy and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: websurface

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't read the description very well, but this thing is REALLY SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Terra Cotta Bread Warmers
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how warm it kept my crescent rolls. I'm glad I purchased it; and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping tortillas warm!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a round unobtrusive stone to keep tortillas warm. This retains heat well in a ceramic warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I Love to Cook/Bake
customer_reviews.text: I am the chef around the house here and I buy a fair amount of "kitchen items" from Amazon. Love the bread warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Bombastus64

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Extremely dissapointed. It was the right size for what I wanted but I received the product with the box smashed and the stone broken. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Kalynn Roy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My guests raved about how warm this kept our rolls all through dinner.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Warm Buns
customer_reviews.text: The bun warmer was a little smaller than I wanted.But it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I think I could have done better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these: one for myself, and two others for gifts. I should have ordered just one for myself first. The package it comes in looks like it came from the Dollar Store. It made me wonder if I could find them at the Dollar Store. (it's that bad). I haven't used it yet; I see no reason why it wouldn't work, other than it's very small.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: but so smart! I purchased this as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: So simple and small, but so smart! I purchased this as a gift for my mother and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Pieczjl

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep muffins warm when I take them to an early meeting. The Fox Run Bread Warmer met all my expectations. It is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Cody

customer_reviews.title: cute and practical!
customer_reviews.text: not available where I live, but price was great even with postage to Australia included. Item arrived in perfect condition and upon inspection the warmer is of good quality and really cute.
customer_reviews.author: caroline a cotton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect, just what I wanted and will be ordering another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Very small and doesn't seem to keep the bread warm. By the time you wrap it in material, which is what they tell you to do, it doesn't seem to transfer the heat to the bread above. It.
customer_reviews.author: picky shopper

customer_reviews.title: Terra Cotta Gardening Pot Plate Works Better for Less $$
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tiny and very thin. I don't see how it could possible ever retain enough heat to keep anything warm at all- and it didn't. Go to a Home Improvement store, buy a Terra Cotta plate that goes under potted plants (various sizes to choose from) and for a fraction-fraction of the price you will have a LOT more Terra Cotta material that will stay warm much longer AND for only a few bucks!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: size and thickness
customer_reviews.text: It is very small and thin, I bought it to replace one that came with a basket. The original one was 8" across this one might be 4" that is judging by the package. And it is very thin again judging by the package as I have not opened it and I am very disappointed in what I have received.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the stone doesn't stay warm very long but I have a very large Bread Basket I thought this Stone was a lot larger so if you have a large Bread Basket you will need at least two I just hated them up in the oven and wrap them in a rag and put them in the bottom of the Bread Basket they only keep the bread warm approximately 15 minutes though
customer_reviews.author: lynette or shaen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thing to keep bread or biscuits warm in a basket. We have had one for years. I bought this one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: Heated the stone in 350 degree oven -- as instructed ...
customer_reviews.text: Heated the stone in 350 degree oven -- as instructed. It did not convey heat to keep the bread warm in the bread basket. I would NOT purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis Gal

customer_reviews.title: bread warmer
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is designed to do...keep bread warm. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: MBO

customer_reviews.title: Warm bread mmmm
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy having the hor stone to keep bread warm throughout meal.
customer_reviews.author: cjbc

customer_reviews.title: Made in China (re: product question)
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than I thought it would be, but it scoops up more than I thought it would! Also it is made of one solid piece of stainless which is great but I didn't expect that the handle would be an incomplete circle. It actually works out great that way because I can hang it on a skinny shelf bar. It's great for kids to chop veggies with because it is a blunt edge but not too sharp. Easy to clean, and I think the apple core isn't too hard to remove when you use the handle for that, just have a fork or something handy to help get the core out. I love having this new tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea but honestly the bread still doesn't seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea but honestly the bread still doesn't seem to stay warm any longer. Maybe I need to heat this thing longer in the oven???
customer_reviews.author: L. McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Warm bread warm hearts!
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps your bread warm. If you love bread (and who doesn't) this is great! My guests were impressed that even towards the end of the meal the remaining garlic bread was still warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use this in any of my baskets or bowls with a dish towel. It is just the right size and doesn't take up a lot of room in my kitchen drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hartt

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived in perfect condition. It's a little smaller than I was ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in perfect condition. It's a little smaller than I was thinking and does not hold heat as well as I had hoped, but it does help!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lee

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect. Win/win
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with some Christmas cash from my dad. Heat, place in a bread basket. Simple and perfect. Win/win. Very happy to have this in my kitchen go toos!
customer_reviews.author: kyoung

customer_reviews.title: Simple, flat shape
customer_reviews.text: Don't get the fancy bench scrapers with the plastic ends - you can't use them to even out your cake frosting on the cake stand! This one has a flat end which comes in handy. It feels sturdy and performs its job well at cutting through dough or for scooping up food off your cutting board (so you don't damage your knives).
customer_reviews.author: viv

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The bread warmer was too small and too thin for my purpose. I saw one that was thicker and larger and held the heat for an hour or more. Unfortunately the Fox Run warmer was not able to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: These are ok, but another thing to bother with.
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, but another thing to bother with. Didn't really do much. I keep buns covered with a heavy napkin anyway, so they stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Bread warmer
customer_reviews.text: Great product to keep the dinner rolls plenty warm for the entire meal. Heat in oven, or microwave and all is great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: but I would like it better if the handle wasn't open
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but I would like it better if the handle wasn't open. Sometimes chopped veggies get in there.
customer_reviews.author: martina

customer_reviews.title: Handy cooking tool
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected. Good stainless steel finish. Washes up nicely. No cracks to catch food, cleans up good in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: LGHCADMAN

customer_reviews.title: Substantial!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a tool I was happy with. I was NOT disappointed! Heavyweight and easy-to-grip strong "handle". The very slightly beveled edge helps get under veggies and fruits to scoop them up. The apple corer feature is a plus, but, I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little guy really works at keeping my bread warm for awhile. A kitchen gadget that is worth using.
customer_reviews.author: d'Artagnan

customer_reviews.title: Great Scraper and Scooper
customer_reviews.text: This scraper works best for me. It is my favorite design.,
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Janczak

customer_reviews.title: Works great except for the apple core function.
customer_reviews.text: Great for scooping, but the apple corer stinks. Core gets stuck inside and it's murder trying to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small but works as well as the larger one I broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my tortillas warm and really works.
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: put in oven when cooking your bread and its ready to keep everything warm while you eat. Great product....everyone got one for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good. Simple design. I chose this because it has no printed letters.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Jeong

customer_reviews.title: but they look like they will do the job they are intended to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these terra cotta, round bread warmers as gifts to use with the two bun and bread warmer baskets I also purchased as gifts. I have not used one, but they look like they will do the job they are intended to do. They are just over 4-1/2 inches in diameter, and 1/4 inch thick. Heating instructions are on the surface of the warmer.
customer_reviews.author: akamarmee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in that fact
customer_reviews.text: Can't put it in microwave to heat it. Very disappointed in that fact. I really don't want to heat up the oven to heat the bread warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

product_meta.title: Fox Run Chopper/Scraper with Apple Corer, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Chopper/Scraper, Stainless SteelChop, scrape, core! Experience the many uses of this simple tool. Made of sturdy stainless steel, this handy Chopper/Scraper is sure to become a staple item in your kitchen. Use to safely chop herbs, fruits, veggies, and nuts, divide dough for rolls and loaves, cut pasta and pastry dough, or slice through dessert bars. To easily clean up messes, use to scrape your cutting boards, counters and more! This multi-functional tool even features a handle that doubles as an apple corer! A small, easy-to-store accessory with a large list of uses.
feature_bullets: Constructed of sturdy, sleek stainless steel
Multi-functional tool, use to chop herbs, fruits, veggies, nuts, etc.
Scrape cuttings and pastry from boards and counters, and cut pasta, pastries and dessert bars
Features convenient apple corer as handle

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
